page.title: 07Roads and Traffic in Sutton
page.content: The roads in Sutton are being repaired at the moment.Sutton is deserted in the winter although they are building a lot of new houses here at the moment.When it is summer Sutton is full of holiday makers and elderly people.The car park down the High Street is full at the moment.The roads are very dangerous in the winter when it has being snowing.Many people fall over in the snow and some people get injured.There is a zebra crossing and a roundabout.There are not many spaces left to park your car in the summer because there are only 2 carparks in Sutton and not a lot of room in front of the shops.There are lots of roads coming of the High Street but some of them are narrow.
